page.title: 13HEALTH FACILITIES, EGERTON
page.content: There are no medical facilities in the village, but most residents do not consider this inconvenient as the nearby Dunscar Health Centre, has good medical facilities for 4 doctors, a chemist and health visitors. Hospital facilities in Bolton meet accident and serious requirements. Dental facilities are available in Bromley Cross, a mile away, and most residents have regular treatment. Most residents are relatively healthy, and consider the facilities adequate. Children are regularly examined by the School medical services which provides additional facilities as required. Regular blood donor sessions are held at Walmsley Community Centre.
